Package com.independentid.scim.security

Class AciSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.independentid.scim.security.AciSet
  • public class AciSet
extends java.lang.Object
    An AciSet contains a set of ACIs applicable to a specific SCIM path. Each set only has one SCIM method (right) at a time. The set also provides the combined set of attributes allowed for a transaction based on the client requesting.

    • Method Detail

      • getRight

        public AccessControl.Rights getRight()

      • isAttributeNotAllowed

        public boolean isAttributeNotAllowed​(Attribute attr)
        Checks an attribute provided against the targetAttr value to see if the attribute is allowed for the ACI.
        Parameters:
        attr - The Attribute to be evaluated
        Returns:
        true If attribute allowed or all attributes wildcarded. Also returns true if targetAttrs is unspecified.

      • isAttrSetAllowed

        public boolean isAttrSetAllowed​(java.util.Set<Attribute> attributeSet)
        Called to check if the attributes used in a filter are allowed.
        Parameters:
        attributeSet - The set of Attributes used in a query filter
        Returns:
        true if all attributes are allowed.

      • isAttrNotReturnable

        public boolean isAttrNotReturnable​(Attribute attr)

      • isTargetFilterAllowed

        public boolean isTargetFilterAllowed​(ScimResource res)

      • copy

        public AciSet copy()
        Generates a copy of the ACIset.
        Returns:
        A safe copy of the current AciSet.

      • filterCopy

        public AciSet filterCopy​(RequestCtx ctx,
                         io.quarkus.security.identity.SecurityIdentity identity)
        Generates a copy of the ACIset but returns only acis that apply to a specific right and that match the client making the operation
        Parameters:
        ctx - The current RequestCtx if available or null (ctx.getRight must be set)
        identity - The current security identity
        Returns:
        A safe copy of the current AciSet.

      • addAci

        public void addAci​(AccessControl aci)
        Adds a potential ACI to the set. To be added, the right granted must match that of the current set.
        Parameters:
        aci - The potential ACI to add.

      • getAcis

        public java.util.List<AccessControl> getAcis()

      • addAll

        public void addAll​(java.util.List<AccessControl> acis,
                   RequestCtx ctx)
        Parameters:
        acis - The set of ACIs to be added
        ctx - RequestCtx is provided, the client match filter will be applied to filter out non-relevant acis
